briefTitle: Long-term Extension Study of BEMA™ Fentanyl
officialTitle: Open-label, Long-term Extension Study for Treatment of Breakthrough Cancer Pain With BEMA™ Fentanyl
summary: This study is designed to provide continued access to BEMA Fentanyl for those subjects who previously participated in FEN-202 and who wish to continue using BEMA Fentanyl for the treatment of their breakthrough cancer pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Efficacy Was Not Measured in This Study. The Number of Deaths in the Long Term Follow-up Will be Reported.
